text: question for people who are frequent interviewers: would it help to have a chunk of time blocked out on your float schedule for interviews? respond to me directly. thanks!
we need your RSVPs for the holiday party TODAY

attachments.fallback: [November 24th, 2015 1:48 PM] abby: Hello everyone! If you wouldn't mind, please hit me up (or Amanda or Stephanie) and let us know if you will be attending the holiday party or not, and if you'll be bringing a sig other. It would be great to have this info by end of day tomorrow. Thanks in advance!!
